an5.119:1.1: “Mendicants, a nun with five qualities is cast down to hell.
an5.119:1.3: Without examining or scrutinizing, she praises those deserving of criticism,
an5.119:1.4: and criticizes those deserving of praise.
an5.119:1.7: and wastes gifts given in faith.
an5.119:1.8: A nun with these five qualities is cast down to hell.
an5.119:2.1: A nun with five qualities is raised up to heaven.
an5.119:2.3: After examining and scrutinizing, she criticizes those deserving of criticism,
an5.119:2.4: and praises those deserving of praise.
an5.119:2.7: and doesn’t waste gifts given in faith.
an5.119:2.8: A nun with these five qualities is raised up to heaven.”
